data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Sassuolo drive upfield and Domenico Berardi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Simone Sozza awards the away team a throw-in.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Benevento.
Free kick Benevento.
Benevento surge into the attack at Mapei Stadium but Gianluca Lapadulaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Sassuolo have been given a penalty...
It's advantage Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia as Domenico Berardi scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 9, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Perparim Hetemaj for Benevento has been booked by Simone Sozza and receives a first yellow card.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Lukas Haraslin of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gianluca Caprari (Benevento) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 15, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Simone Sozza signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Benevento's area.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Benevento push forward at Mapei Stadium and Gianluca Caprari gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Simone Sozza awards Benevento a goal kick.
Benevento are pushing forward but Riccardo Improta's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Artur Ionita (Benevento) has received a first yellow card.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Benevento at Mapei Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Benevento in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 28, Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 29, Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
In the minute 35, Giorgos Kyriakopoulos of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 36, Gianluca Caprari (Benevento) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Benevento are whistled for offside.
Benevento needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, Simone Sozza awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Simone Sozza.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 42, Gianluca Lapadula (Benevento) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Benevento drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Simone Sozza awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
The first-half is over at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Roberto Insigne is replacing Perparim Hetemaj for Benevento at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 48, Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gaetano Letizia for Benevento who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lukas Haraslin (Sassuolo) has been sent off!
In the minute 50, Gaetano Letizia is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Benevento.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Giacomo Raspadori is on a sub for Maxime Lopez for Sassuolo.
The home team have replaced Filip Djuricic with Jeremie Boga. This is the second substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
Sassuolo make their third substitution with Kaan Ayhan replacing Jeremy Toljan.
In the minute 57, Filippo Inzaghi is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Bryan Dabo replacing Artur Ionita.
Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Throw-in for Benevento close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benevento's Roberto Insigne is on target but unsuccessful.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
In the minute 62, In Reggio Emilia, Federico Barba (Benevento) misses the target with a header.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Benevento drives forward and Gianluca Caprari gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 63, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
Gianluca Caprari (Benevento) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Benevento drive upfield and Pasquale Schiattarella gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 64, Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Gianluca Caprari for Benevento gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Gianluca Caprari fires in a strike for Benevento.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico Barba is booked for the away team.
In the minute 70, Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianluca Caprari (Benevento) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
In the minute 74, In Reggio Emilia, Riccardo Improta of Benevento is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In Reggio Emilia Benevento attack through Riccardo Improta. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a third substitution, with Marco Sau replacing Federico Barba.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 77, Simone Sozza signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Benevento's half.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento attack but Bryan Dabo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 79, Simone Sozza awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Iago Falque is replacing Gianluca Caprari for Benevento at Mapei Stadium.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Gianluca Lapadula fires in a strike for Benevento.
In the minute 81, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Benevento are coming forward and Riccardo Improta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 82, Simone Sozza waits before resuming play because Giorgos Kyriakopoulos for Sassuolo is still down.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Rogerio is the substitute for Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Mehdi Bourabia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 84, Benevento have a goal kick.
Benevento apply pressure at Mapei Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Iago Falque but the strike hits the bar!
Throw-in Benevento.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Benevento.
Kaan Ayhan (Sassuolo) gets a yellow card.
At Mapei Stadium, Bryan Dabo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Domenico Berardi with Mert Muldur. This is the fifth substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
At Mapei Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
Benevento push forward at Mapei Stadium and Gianluca Lapadula gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
Simone Sozza awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Benevento's Riccardo Improta gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
Benevento's Bryan Dabo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Simone Sozza blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
